name: association européenne de la pensée libre
membership: AEPL does not belong to any other organsation or network
goal:
1. Promote the European Union project among European citizens
2. Ensure that the views and opinions of secular Europeans are heard within the European Union institutions.
3. Participate to the dialogue between the institutions of the EU with the non confessionnal and religious organizations (article 17 of the Treaty))
interests: Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
European Commission Annual Work Programme and Roadmaps
European Parliament Legislative Observatory
European Commission policy on anti-semitism and anti-Musulmans
Transatlantic Trade and Investment
Partnership Dialogue art. 17
Artificial intelligence alliance
